abort.already_exists: Config entry with the same username exists.
abort.empty_config: Integration configuration appears to be empty.

user.description:
Enter credentials for your Moscow State Services account panel.

Adjusting device information is optional, and may be left as is.

_**Disabling SSL certificate verification poses a potential security threat. It is highly advised against using this option!**_
user.title: Authentication

abort.yaml_not_supported:
YAML configuration is not supported.

Please, configure relevant options via YAML.

data.middle_name: FSSP: Middle name / patronymic (new profile, optional)
data.issue_date: Driving License: Issue date (new document, optional)
data.remove_driving_licenses: Driving License: Choose documents to remove

init.description:
To add a new FSSP account entry fill out **Last name**, **First name**, **Birth date** (format: Year-Month-Date), and (optionally) **Middle name** fields before saving.

To remove an existing FSSP account entry choose elements from a dropdown list before saving.

To add a new driving license certificate fill out **Document series** and (optionally) **Issue date** fields before saving.

To remove an existing driving license entry choose elements from a dropdown list before saving.
